text_block_list.name: Former Mile King's Trainer
text_block_list.text:
——A true Mile King is someone who has conquered 
all three distances. That's what I believe.

text_block_list.name: Former Mile King's Trainer
text_block_list.text:
For an Uma Musume, distance compatibility is a huge barrier. 
However, a Miler is overflowing with potential.

text_block_list.name: Former Mile King's Trainer
text_block_list.text:
A potential that can overcome even 
that distance compatibility barrier.

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
……… 
……potential……

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
(……the potential within me. 
If I can find that, then I……I can……)

text_block_list.name: Former Mile King's Trainer
text_block_list.text:
The speed to challenge a Sprint, and the stamina to make 
it through medium distance. Miler Uma Musume have both.

text_block_list.name: Former Mile King's Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Even if that path may be difficult, 
that potential cannot be ignored.

text_block_list.name: Former Mile King's Trainer
text_block_list.text:
That's why those that have trained in the Mile are the strongest. 
That's why one who has conquered all three is the True Mile King.

Conquering all three distances……in other words, 
victory in the Sprint, Mile, and Medium distance. 
——It really was an incredibly difficult road.

Uma Musume had a distance suitability. It was something 
determined at birth, and was not easily overcome.
It was fundamentally down to how their body developed.

Even if they had the distance suitability, it was still difficult to 
win even one race. To aim for more was an incredibly high hurdle——

Even for a veteran trainer, this would be a lofty dream. Of course, 
it's not like there weren't Uma Musume who would aim for that.

——Yamanin Zephyr. She was the Uma Musume that had 
come the closest to conquering all three distances.

She could run like the wind, and many people 
were cheering on her dream. And then——

She won the Mile distance 『Yasuda Kinen』 twice. Then 
after winning the Medium distance 『Tenno Sho (Autumn)』 
she finally made her attempt at the 『Sprinter Stakes』——
The Short distance Ace——Sakura Bakushin O defeated her.
And it wasn't just her.

The Uma Musume known as the strongest Miler, 
even she was unable to overcome that barrier——

Up until now, I'd also only been looking at things from the 
perspective of distance suitability. Perhaps because of that, 
I couldn't see myself as a trainer that could overcome that.

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san! Good Miling～!?

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
Are you tired? I wanted you to learn a lot about me, 
so I dragged you around to so many places……

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
But the scenery here is nice, so let's have a little 
chat while taking a break. Ummm… I really love Miles!!

We'd only just met, but I could understand that much. 
——And that's why I couldn't say it thoughtlessly.
『Let's chase that same dream together』

I can't let myself get swept up in the moment and 
then end up destroying her dream. I decided it 
would be best to tell her my honest thoughts.

I didn't say 『I can't do it』 
I couldn't say that about something I had never tried before.

But at this point, it was just so implausible and unimaginable 
for me. That's what I wanted her to know but——

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text: What, so that's all it is!

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
In short, you just can't imagine conquering all three 
distances right? In that case, I'll show you! Not just 
an image, I'll show you I can make that dream real!

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
I've already decided on you! It's already been 
decided my MiRules! And I won't change my mind!

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
We'll aim for the same dream…… 
And together let's bask in all the cheers!!

『I can make that dream real——』, a few days 
after making that declaration, Gran Alegria 
had called for me. And the one with her was——
The one known as the strongest Miler——Taiki Shuttle.

The winner of the 『Mile Championship』, 『Sprinter's S』 
and several other G1s. Someone who was well known in 
the Uma Musume world as a strong short distance racer.

And it wasn't just limited to Japan. She had claimed 
victory in the French 『Prix Jacques Le Marois』
That was the kind of Uma Musume that was facing Gran Alegria.

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text: I'm looking forward to today!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Likewise! A match against an Uma Musume aiming to 
win at all three distances! It's really exciting～!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
It's a precious time. 
——……Let's do this seriously.

As I watched both of them, 
Gran Alegria noticed me and waved. And then——

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text: I'm off!!

——And suddenly, it was a showdown between the Strongest 
Miler and an Uma Musume aiming to be the True Mile Queen.
